name: 351.vdb_f83a_1c6a_9d
body:
<!-- Optional: add a release summary here -->
## 🐛 Bug fixes

* [JENKINS-65972](https://issues.jenkins.io/browse/JENKINS-65972) - Use SecretPatterns API (#219) @cronik
* Ensure ssh private key ends with newline (#213) @cronik
* fixes [SECURITY-2521](https://www.jenkins.io/security/advisory/2022-02-15/#SECURITY-2521) (#221) @jetersen
* Ensure vault access only takes place from the controller - fixes [SECURITY-2429](https://www.jenkins.io/security/advisory/2022-02-15/#SECURITY-2429) (#228) @jamesrobson-secondmind

## 👻 Maintenance

* chore: use jenkins infra maven cd reusable workflow (#241) @jetersen
* Update dependabot.yml (#229) @jetersen

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump maven-checkstyle-plugin from 3.1.1 to 3.1.2 (#235) @dependabot
* Bump aws-java-sdk from 1.11.955 to 1.12.246-349.v96b_b_f7eb_a_c3c (#232) @dependabot

## 💥 Breaking changes

## 🚀 New features and improvements

* Add credential type to authenticate with Google Container Registry (#179) @jamesrobson-secondmind

## 🐛 Bug fixes

* add context in doTestConnection (#200) @jetersen

## 📝 Documentation updates

* Update README.md (#157) @bablushaw23

## 👻 Maintenance

* enable cd workflow (#199) @jetersen

name: v3.1.0 - Kubernetes ❤

<!-- Optional: add a release summary here -->

## 🚀 New features and improvements

* CasC: allow login by Kubernetes ServiceAccount (#66) @marcoreni
* Support prefixPath field (#67) @marcoreni
* [JENKINS-59847](https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-59847) - allow login by AppRole mount (#63) @casz
* switch to using jwt auth method for kubernetes (#62) @cpoole

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Upgrade to use jcasc test harness (#68) @timja
* Support prefixPath field (#67) @marcoreni
* Bump checkstyle from 8.17 to 8.18 (#65) @dependabot

## 👻 Maintenance

* fix mvn flags on powershell (#64) @casz

name: v3.0.0 - SSL verification 👍
body:
SSL verification is enabled, so if your using a self-signed root certificate or a certificate not included in the default truststore under `$JAVA_HOME/lib/jre/cacerts` you need to add it. You can [learn more here](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/11617210/how-to-properly-import-a-selfsigned-certificate-into-java-keystore-that-is-avail)
The certificate should be added to the Jenkins Master certificate store

## :boom: Breaking changes

* `skip ssl veritifcation` used to skip when left unchecked (ie. the default) however now you need to check it to skip SSL verification. This way SSL verification is now enabled by default. (#57) @casz

## 🚀 New features and improvements

* Add username/password credential, support namespace, add timeout option (#56) @casz, @dulvac, @volteanu, and @mtarantino
* Add Kubernetes Auth method (#52) @netfalo

## 🐛 Bug Fixes

* fix trusting the default trust store (#57) @casz
* [JENKINS-59247](https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-59247) - fix "Fail if path is not found" (#55) @MichaelSp

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump vault from 1.12.0 to 1.12.2 (#60) @casz
* use versions from BOM (#58) @casz
* BOM 3 (#54) @jglick

## 👻 Maintenance

* add integration tests for build wrapper against vault container (#59) @casz

<!-- Optional: add a release summary here -->
This release enables you to use a Vault agent as your [Secret Source] for [JCasC]
by using the `CASC_VAULT_AGENT_ADDR`

[Vault Agent] allows to setup caching and auto authentication for more details [click here](https://github.com/jenkinsci/hashicorp-vault-plugin#vault-agent)

## 🚀 New features and improvements

* add support for vault agent's auto authentication for JCasC secret source (#47) @casz
* add symbol `hashicorpVault` for global vault configuration (#47) @casz
  
* [JENKINS-44704](https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-44704) - support variable expand for vault path (#45) @casz

## 📝 Documentation updates

* add vault agent documentation (#49) @casz
* simplify pipeline snippet (#46) @casz

## 👻 Maintenance

* add missing annotations (#48) @casz

## 📦 Dependency updates
* Bump Jenkins version from 2.60.3 to 2.138.4 (#47) @casz
* Bump vault-java-driver from 4.0.0 to 5.0.0 (#47) @casz
  allows vault agent to work
* Bump configuration-as-code from 1.28 to 1.29 (#47) @casz
  fixes vault initialization being called too late.
* Bump vault testcontainer from 1.10.6 to 1.12.0 (#47) @casz

[JCasC]: https://github.com/jenkinsci/configuration-as-code-plugin
[Secret Source]: https://github.com/jenkinsci/configuration-as-code-plugin#secret-sources
[Vault Agent]: https://www.vaultproject.io/docs/agent/

name: v2.3.1
body:
<!-- Optional: add a release summary here -->
## 🐛 Bug Fixes

* [JENKINS-58970](https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-58970) - allow setting engine version on `VaultConfiguration` (#42) @casz

## 👻 Maintenance

* add travis ci (#39) @casz
* Add codestyle, checkstyle. Switch to SpotBugs annotations. Format! (#43) @casz

## 🚦 Internal changes

* enable incrementals artifacts (#38) @casz

<!-- Optional: add a release summary here -->
## 🚀 New features and improvements

* Added support for secret engine V2 (19aabcbbb51c9e18f9c2a43414d0f00861abf659, a8b29a3b92c05c42b8b95cea911621badcccf938) @ptierno @casz
* Add retries to loginByGCP() method (#30) @karolkrawczyk
* Credential binding (#20) @crathjen
* Add withVault symbol (#37) @casz
* Improved step generator experience (#37) @casz
* Make envVar optional in `secretValues`
  Left empty `vaultKey` will be used as the environment variable name (#37) @casz

## 🐛 Bug Fixes

* Fix/null secret values (#25) @Akash-Jain-GMI

## 📝 Documentation updates

* Update documentation for KV 2 Engine and backward compatibility (#29) @binlab

## 👻 Maintenance

* Improvements (#37) @casz
* support building against recent Jenkins LTS and JDK 11 (#33) @casz
* update parent POM and cleanup pom (#31) @casz

## 📦 Dependency updates
* update vault-java-driver to 4.0.0 (#23) @jedidiahB

## 🚦 Internal changes

* Enable Release Drafter for the plugin (#32) @oleg-nenashev
